title: Gold Holds Near $5,000 as Lunar New Year Holiday Mutes Trade
description: Gold was little changed in early trade, with much of Asia closed for the Lunar New Year and after a US holiday on Monday.
content: Gold was little changed in early trade, with much of Asia closed for the Lunar New Year and after a US holiday on Monday.
